author: nick.ghita
content: has anybody generated mainnet era files / are they available anywhere online?

author: kolbyml
content: Era1 isn’t finalized according to what is said https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/739145593762611250/1193308803396026528 in this link, but if you want I could use the open PR and generate up to pre-byzantium for us. The only concern is the format isn’t finalized and can change.

author: kolbyml
content: Also nick we should probably share what you posted in portal general chat `Neither erigon (https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/issues/8159) nor reth (https://github.com/paradigmxyz/reth/issues/853) support valid pre-byzantium receipts, and don't appear to be implementing support anytime soon (I suspect it might be a difficult/low-priority lift on their end).`. That being said (assuming the validation requirements are the same as portal) erigon/reth can't be used to generate era1 files for pre-byzantium.

author: kolbyml
content: <@543900561460822016> what is your take on this?

author: kolbyml
content: Infura also doesn't provide valid pre-byzantium receipts I seen a 7 months ago or so.
